name: Blackjack 21 for 2014
description:
Play the BEST BLACKJACK game in your mobile!

Play Blackjack like never before on your hand like in real casino environment! Realistic and intuitive graphics designed at best for mobile! The aim of the game is to accumulate a higher point total than the dealer, but without going over 21. You compute your score by adding the values of your individual cards. The cards 2 through 10 have their face value, J, Q, and K are worth 10 points each, and the Ace is worth either 1 or 11 points (player's choice).

Get into the excitement & thrill of winning the pot against the dealer. Define your strategies and practice blackjack to achieve perfection! So play right away to get into the blackjack against the dealer and see who can get 21 without getting bust!

Game Features & Highlights

- Gorgeous & high quality graphics
- Beautifully animated cards and interaction
- Choose between new table themes
- Multiple betting tables to choose from
- Easy touch and interaction with all the betting chips
- Buy insurance if the dealer might have blackjack
- Split hands or double down to win big
- Unlimited free chips!
